Usage: apic {{props}} OPTIONS

  List the properties of running services

  Options
    -r, --{{remote}}                     use the remote app target (defaults to local)
    -S, --{{service}} SERVICE_NAME       service name
    -o, --{{organization}} ORGANIZATION  provider organization
    -s, --{{server}} SERVER              server endpoint host

  List the properties of the running services associated with the current LoopBack application
    {{$ apic props}}
    [{{climbon}}] prop1: value1
    [{{climbon}}] prop2: value2
    [{{climbon-gw}}] prop3: value3
    [{{climbon-gw}}] prop4: value4

  List the properties of the LoopBack application service
    {{$ apic props --service climbon}}
    prop1: value1
    prop2: value2

  List the properties of the {{Micro Gateway}} service
    {{$ apic props --service climbon-gw}}
    prop1: value1
    prop2: value2

  List the properties of a remote application
    {{$ apic props --remote --service climbon --organization climbon --server mgmnthost.com}}
    prop1: value1
    prop2: value2

Type "apic COMMAND -h" for help on the following related commands:

  {{props:get}}         Get a service property
  {{props:set}}         Set or update a service property
  {{props:delete}}      Delete a service property
  {{props:clear}}       Delete all service properties
